message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. It comes with a variety of features that we believe will greatly benefit you. Considering its quality and functionality, I would like to propose a price of $150 for this product. Please let me know if this offer suits your budget.
I'm interested in the product, but $150 is a bit above my budget. I was thinking of a price around $120. Would you be willing to consider a price closer to that?
